description: Central version registry for InformatiK-AI Methodology flow commands

flow-feature-build.description: Dynamic Task Executor with modular architecture
changes: 3.3.0: Added Phase 0 retry loop, mandatory context cache, parallel agents, modular files
3.2.0: Added pre-flight check, plan validation gate, code review

flow-feature-tdd.description: TDD workflow module (Strategy → Red → Green → Refactor)

flow-feature-rad.description: RAD workflow module (Prototype → Analyze → Iterate → Test)

flow-plan.description: Strategic Planner with multi-scope support (planning-only mode)
changes: 3.3.0: CRITICAL FIX - Added explicit termination, prohibited EnterPlanMode/ExitPlanMode tools, skills run in planning-only mode
3.2.0: Phase 2 now prefers modular_index.json over parsing CLAUDE.md
3.1.0: Added modular architecture support in Phase 2
3.0.0: Added brainstorming/writing-plans skills, DAG integration, error recovery
2.3.0: Added error recovery for missing agents
2.2.0: Added hybrid model for team selection

flow-qa-validate.description: Dynamic QA Validator with iteration limits
changes: 2.3.0: Added code-reviewer, structured escalation, optimized iteration passing

flow-feedback-fix.description: Feedback loop implementation with optimized state passing

flow-issue-create.description: VCS task creator with agent/skill integration
changes: 2.0.0: Added metrics tracking, removed hardcoded references

flow-analyze-bug.description: Bug analysis with auto-healing team selection
changes: 2.2.0: Fixed metrics blocks, removed hardcoded references
